DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study investigate six month period physical exercise , could improve motor memory consolidation elderly people pedal dexterity
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Motor Memory Pedal Dexterity
DOC.detailed_description: 34 subject gender , mean age 71 year old participate study . Subjects divide two group : control group experimental one . Before intervention physical exercise program , subject perform Tapping Pedal Test measure baseline performance . After intervention , assessment impact exercise motor memory consolidation hold three stage : Training ; 1 hour training 24 hour training .
DOC.criteria: individual engage physical activity ; person age 65 year . sensory abnormality ; mental abnormality ; motor abnormality ; atypical health problem .
